text: Ar-Rahman (, ; The MercifulGeorge Sale translation) is the 55th Chapter (Surah) of the Qur'an. It has 78 verses (āyāt). The chapter commonly repeats the phrase "Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?" starting from Quran 55:13 to Quran 55:77. ==References== Category:Chapters in the Quran
title: Surah ar-Rahman
